Data Retention Shortfall.title: QCB Regulatory Framework Portal - Data Protection Guidelines
Data Retention Shortfall.description: Official QCB regulations on data retention requirements for financial institutions, requiring 10-year retention for transaction records.

Data Retention Shortfall.title: Data Retention Policy Template (10-year compliant)
Data Retention Shortfall.description: A template policy and retention schedule aligned to QCB Article 2.1.3 recommending a 10-year retention period for transaction records.

P2P Monitoring Gap.title: FATF Recommendations - Transaction Monitoring
P2P Monitoring Gap.description: Global standards for transaction monitoring and suspicious activity detection in P2P financial services.

P2P Monitoring Gap.title: QCB Fintech Strategy - Transaction Monitoring Requirements
P2P Monitoring Gap.description: QCB guidelines on implementing transaction monitoring systems for fintech platforms and P2P lending services.

Data Residency.title: QCB Regulatory Framework - Data Residency Requirements
Data Residency.description: Official QCB regulations requiring customer data to be stored and processed within the State of Qatar.

Data Residency.title: QCB Fintech Strategy - Cloud Usage Guidelines
Data Residency.description: Guidelines on cloud adoption for fintech firms, including data residency and sovereignty requirements.

Transaction Monitoring.title: FATF AML/CFT Guidelines - Transaction Monitoring
Transaction Monitoring.description: International standards for anti-money laundering and counter-financing of terrorism compliance, including transaction monitoring controls.

Transaction Monitoring.title: QFCRA Rulebook - AML Controls
Transaction Monitoring.description: Qatar Financial Centre Regulatory Authority rules on transaction monitoring and AML controls for financial services.

Licensing Strategy.title: QCB Regulatory Framework - Licensing Requirements
Licensing Strategy.description: Complete guide to QCB licensing categories, capital requirements, and application procedures for fintech firms.

Licensing Strategy.title: QDB Support Services - Licensing Advisory
Licensing Strategy.description: Qatar Development Bank programs offering guidance and support for startups navigating QCB licensing requirements.

Licensing Strategy.title: Magnitt Qatar Fintech Report - Licensing Benchmarks
Licensing Strategy.description: Regional fintech landscape report showing licensing approaches and success factors for Qatar-based fintechs.

Corporate Structure.title: QCB Regulatory Framework - Corporate Governance
Corporate Structure.description: Official requirements for board structure, compliance officer roles, and fit-and-proper documentation for financial institutions.

Corporate Structure.title: Generic Startup Legal Documents Template
Corporate Structure.description: Standard templates for Articles of Association, board resolutions, and corporate governance documentation.

AML Policy Drafting.title: FATF Recommendations - AML/CFT Standards
AML Policy Drafting.description: The global standard for anti-money laundering and counter-financing of terrorism that Qatar financial institutions must comply with.

AML Policy Drafting.title: QCB AML/CFT Policy Requirements
AML Policy Drafting.description: Qatar Central Bank requirements for board-approved AML/CFT policies and procedures for licensed financial institutions.

AML Policy Drafting.title: Example AML Policy Template
AML Policy Drafting.description: Comprehensive AML/CFT policy template designed for fintech startups, including KYC procedures and suspicious activity reporting.
